alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:10PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Twin Falls and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 709 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Three Creek, or 18 miles northeast of Jarbidge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crawfish Crossing and Middle Butte around 710 PM MDT. Salls Crossing around 720 PM MDT. Juniper Butte around 730 PM MDT. Black Butte, Coonskin Butte, Roseworth and Horse Butte around 740 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
